spec_data.Name: perl-Carp-Clan-Share
spec_data.Description:
This is a very lightweight helper module (actually just an import method)
that will automagically create a __PACKAGE__::Carp module for you.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 08:22:43 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Share your Carp::Clan settings with your whole Clan
